solution_line_template: Jim gave {brother_sets}*{cards_per_set} = <<{brother_sets}*{cards_per_set}={cards_to_brother}>>{cards_to_brother} trading cards to his brother.
Jim gave {sister_sets}*{cards_per_set} = <<{sister_sets}*{cards_per_set}={cards_to_sister}>>{cards_to_sister} trading cards to his sister.
Jim gave {friend_sets}*{cards_per_set} = <<{friend_sets}*{cards_per_set}={cards_to_friend}>>{cards_to_friend} trading cards to his friends.

Jim gave away a total of {cards_to_brother}+{cards_to_sister}+{cards_to_friend} = <<{cards_to_brother}+{cards_to_sister}+{cards_to_friend}={total_cards_given_away}>>{total_cards_given_away} trading cards.
